colorListing.nameInvalid: Only letters and hyphen are allowed
colorListing.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the color "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

ai.title: Generate Colors with AI
ai.apiKeyHelp: Your key is stored only in your browser and sent with this request.
ai.promptHelp: Describe the desired style, mood, and constraints.
ai.promptPlaceholder: e.g., A clean, minimalist theme with soft neutrals and a bold accent...
ai.defaultPrompt: Design a modern, soft, accessible theme with a calming primary and a vibrant accent. Generate both LIGHT and DARK mode mappings. For DARK mode, choose base colors that are explicitly suitable for dark UIs and stay harmonized with the LIGHT palette (same family, different tuning for contrast). Return only theme variables and mappings.

index.heroSubtitle: Create beautiful, customizable themes for your Nuxt UI components. Define your own colors and customize all variants to your liking.
index.featureColorsDesc: Create and manage your own color palettes with all shades from 50 to 950.
index.featureComponentsDesc: Customize all component variants like solid, outline, soft and many more.
index.featurePreviewDesc: See your changes in real time and test different combinations.
index.gettingStartedSubtitle: Start by creating your own color palette or explore the available components.
index.headTitle: Theme Builder for Nuxt UI - Home
index.headDescription: Create beautiful, customizable themes for your Nuxt UI components.

variableConfigurator.cssDesc: Adjust additional CSS variables used for special UI elements.

themeMapping.assignDesc: Map your created colors to Nuxt UI theme variables to customize the look of UI components.
themeMapping.cssDesc: Adjust additional CSS variables used for special UI elements.

preview.popoverContent: This is a popover content with text and links.
preview.themingPreviewDesc: Adjust variables and see the effect immediately here.
preview.heroSubtitle: The modern solution for your web projects – fast, beautiful and modular thanks to Nuxt UI.
preview.featureFastDesc: Blazing fast performance via SSR and Vite.
preview.featureResponsiveDesc: Looks great on every device – thanks to Tailwind & Nuxt UI.
preview.featureModularDesc: Build your app with reusable components and clear structure.
preview.testimonial1: “Nuxtify completely changed our developer experience. Faster, nicer, better!”
preview.testimonial2: “I love Nuxt UI’s design system – no custom UI library needed anymore.”
